summary: Simple Dog Retexture for vanilla dogs. Optional file includes standalone dog follower \"Spots\", who can be found near Lake Ilinalta, not far away from a mage altar.
descriptionHtml:
MAIN FILE
--------------

Mod name: TheWinterhawks Dog Retex - Spots
Version: 1.0
Author: TheWinterhawk
Function: works as a simple dog skin replacer for all vanilla dogs.

To install extract and merge the Data folder with your skyrim Data folder.

To uninstall go to Data\\textures\\actors\\dog and remove the dog.dds file. If the remaining folders in the structure are empty after this step you can delete them. Don\'t delete the whole folder structure, if other files share that path! ;)


OPTIONAL FILE
---------------------

Function: adds standalone dog \"Spots\" to the world.

If you don\'t want all your dogs to look alike with such an actually unique texture, I\'ve uploaded an optional file, which includes a ready standalone dog called \"Spots\". You can recruit him. He\'s a bit smaller than the regular dogs and he can be found in wilderness cell -3, -17. Take a look at the included screenshot to find the place.


To install the optional files extract and drop the meshes, textures and scripts folder into your skyrim Data folder.

To uninstall remove the following two folders structures (be careful not to remove folders, that share files with other mods!):

Data\\meshes\\TheWinterhawk\\Spots\\dogspots.nif
Data\\textures\\TheWinterhawk\\Spots\\dogspots.dds
Data\\scripts\\aa_DogSpotsFollow.pex


Spot\'s Data
----------------

The standalone version (Optional File) provides a dog actor with the following stats:

- recruitable
- unique
- flagged essential
- doesn\'t affect stealth meter
- speed 135 (since he\'s smaller it isn\'t the full speed)
- levels with player from lvl 5 to 50
- fighter bandit melee class
- health offset 100 (extra)


PERMISSION TERMS
---------------------------

You have my full permission to use this texture for your skyrim projects. Please, don\'t forget to credit me for my work. Thank you!



Enjoy the mod!


TheWinterhawk =)


###############

[color=orange][b]My Other Mods:[/b][/color]

If you\'re interested in my other works, I\'d be glad to see/read you on one of the following pages:

[color=lightblue][b]- TheWinterhawks Black Wolf Lodge[/b][/color]
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14660
--> An upper class/noble playerhouse with horse stables, dogs and a farm maiden npc

[color=lightblue][b]- TheWinterhawks Hunter Saddle With Variants[/b][/color]
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22755
--> 3 hunter saddle variants

[color=lightblue][b]- No More Stupid Dog Comments[/b][/color]
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21225
--> Stops NPCs from saying: \"Stupid Dog!\"

[color=lightblue][b]- TheWinterhawks Hunting Dog Retex[/b][/color]
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21293
--> 4 similar variants to choose from (replacer only)

[color=lightblue][b]- TheWinterhawks Dog Retex - Spots[/b][/color]
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26360
--> A white dog puppy with black spots (available as retex and standalone)

[color=lightblue][b]- Ice Floes - Travel the Polar Sea Dry-Shod[/b][/color]
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26194
--> No more swimming in half frozen water to get to several locations, incl. Serpent\'s Stone

[color=lightblue][b]- TheWinterhawks Romantic Hut - Lunds Hut Overhaul[/b][/color]
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28352
--> Small lore-friendly player house for Dovahkiin and his love

[color=lightblue][b]- TheWinterhawks Decently Recolored Whiterun - Retexture[/b][/color]
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28599/
--> Gives Whiterun a warmer, more cultivated look
author: TheWinterhawk
